tool.name: FeatureSelection
tool.description: : Wrapper class for the bioml Feature selection module.

param.name: input_features
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: The path to the training features that contains both ifeature and possum in csv format. Format: [input].CSV

param.name: label
param.label: input CSV file
param.help: The path to the labels of the training set in a csv format if not in the features, if present in the features csv use the flag to specify the label column name. Format: [input].CSV

param.name: outname_output_excel
param.label: output XLSX name
param.help: The file path to where the selected features will be saved in excel format Format: [output].XLSX

param.name: outname_output_zip
param.label: output ZIP name
param.help: A zip file with the extra parameters Format: [output].ZIP

param.name: sele
param.label: Take tool settings:
param.help: Select where tool settings are to be read from

param.name: properties
param.label: Configuration file
param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: jsonstr
param.label: JSON string
param.help: JSON string containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: feature_range
param.label: feature_range
param.help: Specify the minimum and maximum of number of features in start:stop:step format or a single integer. Stop can be none then the default value will be (n_samples / 2)".

param.name: num_thread
param.label: num_thread
param.help: The number of threads to use for parallelizing the feature selection.

param.name: variance_threshold
param.label: variance_threshold
param.help: It will influence the features to be eliminated the larger the less restrictive.

param.name: scaler
param.label: scaler
param.help: Choose one of the scaler available in scikit-learn, defaults to RobustScaler. Options: ("robust", "standard", "minmax").

param.name: kfold_parameters
param.label: kfold_parameters
param.help: The parameters for the kfold in num_split:test_size format.

param.name: rfe_steps
param.label: rfe_steps
param.help: The number of steps for the RFE algorithm, the more step the more precise but also more time consuming be used to select specific columns from all the generated features for the new data.

param.name: plot
param.label: plot
param.help: Default to true, plot the feature importance using shap.

param.name: plot_num_features
param.label: plot_num_features
param.help: How many features to include in the plot.

param.name: num_filters
param.label: num_filters
param.help: The number univariate filters to use maximum 10".
